quote: In 2024, year to date, she has made $60,000 in commissions directly through social media.
why_clipworthy: This statistic highlights the tangible financial benefits of using video effectively.
suggested_hook: Want to make $60,000 from social media? Here's how one agent did it!

quote: She locked in a client through social media... someone she hadn't seen in over a decade.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the power of social media to reconnect and convert old acquaintances into clients.
suggested_hook: Reconnect and convert: How social media can revive old connections into new clients.
